item.title: About Loom Legal
item.description: Who are Loom Legal? Loom Legal’s team are part of the former senior management team of Ochresoft, the owner of Intelliworks Conveyancing software. Richard Bretherton, Solicitor and former CEO, Nigel Paul FCA, former FD and Katrina Bevan, formerly head of operations, are now providing specialist outsourcing for conveyancers, in partnership with WNS Global. We are ably assisted by Viv Williams, former Chairman of Ochresoft and by Richard Hinton of Pitsford Consulting.
